definition: the relative prominence of a syllable or musical note, especially with regard to stress or pitch, put stress on
details:
noun
- the relative prominence of a syllable or musical note, especially with regard to stress or pitch
= example: the relative prominence of a syllable or musical note, especially with regard to stress or pitch
= synonyms: emphasis
- (physics) force that produces strain on a physical body
= example: (physics) force that produces strain on a physical body
- (psychology) a state of mental or emotional strain or suspense
= synonyms: tension
- difficulty that causes worry or emotional tension
= example: difficulty that causes worry or emotional tension
= synonyms: strain
- special emphasis attached to something
= example: special emphasis attached to something
= synonyms: focus
verb
- put stress on
= synonyms: accent
- to stress, single out as important
= synonyms: accent
- test the limits of
= synonyms: strain
